meanings.definition: A visor is a projecting brim on a cap or hat.
meanings.sent1: She wore a cap with a vizors to shield her eyes from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The baseball player adjusted his vizors before stepping up to bat.
meanings.sent3: The vizors on his hat made him look like a futuristic superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her vizors cast a shadow over her face, giving her an air of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The vizors on the helmet were so large, they almost covered his entire face.

meanings.definition: To visor is to provide with a visor.
meanings.sent1: He will vizors his helmet before going out for a bike ride.
meanings.sent2: She carefully vizors her sunglasses to protect her eyes from the glare.

meanings.sent4: The knight vizors his helmet before charging into battle.
meanings.sent5: Remember to vizors your hat before heading out into the sun.

meanings.definition: Vizors is the plural form of visor.
meanings.sent1: The store sells various hats with different colored vizors.
meanings.sent2: In the costume shop, you can find masks with vizors of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a collection of hats with detachable vizors.
meanings.sent4: The army issued helmets with vizors to protect the soldiers' faces.
